item.description:
The Boston Chapter of Women in Bio (WIB) is hosting a Meetup from 2:30-3:30pm on Tuesday, June 19 during the 2012 BIO International Convention.

The Meetup will take place in the Beantown Bar hosted by Biogen Idec  in the North Lobby. Come mix and mingle with Boston area biotech women.

 

Please note the time change as the Mass Pavilion has a special event at 4 pm.
item.how_to_find_us: The Meetup will take place in the Beantown Bar hosted by Biogen Idec in the North Lobby.
item.name: Boston Chapter of Women in Bio Meetup at the 2012 BIO International Convention
